ifc-analysis.name: IFC CO2 Analysis
ifc-analysis.description: Analyze IFC building models for CO2 emissions. Parses IFC files, classifies materials, calculates embodied carbon using Dutch NIBE database, and generates reports.

data-prep.description: MUST BE USED when starting IFC analysis. Parses IFC files and creates classification batches.

batch-processor.description: MUST BE USED for classifying building elements. Spawned IN PARALLEL for each batch.

durability-calculator.description: MUST BE USED after all batches are classified. Calculates CO2 impact using NIBE database.
